title: Tweet Not Sent
effect: Negate an attack from a Highbie or lower due to phone connection issues.
flavor: The tweet was a banger... in another timeline.

title: Muted!!!!
effect: Select an opponent's card and a card on your field. The opponent's selected card cannot attack your selected card.

title: Tier List
effect: Bait moots into commenting. Gain 1 EP for each unique comment.

title: Gifted Premium
effect: Lowbie gains permanent +10 attack.

title: X Jail
effect: Target card cannot follow, like, or bookmark for 3 turns.

title: Fired from Job
effect: This card can attack twice in one turn.

title: Post Startup Idea
effect: Deal 10 damage. If opponent has more followers, deal +10.

title: Face Dox Fail
effect: No effect. Just awkward silence.
flavor: This is who you were arguing with.

title: RAGE BAIT
effect: Deal +20 damage, but take 20 self-damage.
flavor: You knew what you were doing.

title: Horny Jail
effect: Card cannot attack next turn. Distracted by browsing.

title: How My Email Finds You
effect: Draw 1 card. If card is an action, play it immediately.
flavor: I hope this message finds you well...

title: Spam Filtered
effect: Negate an attack or action that failed to go through.

title: Monitoring the Situation
effect: Nothing happens this turn.

title: Nothing Ever Happens
effect: Cancel the effect of another action, attack, or ability.

title: Yuri Posting
effect: Gain +2 EP next turn. Opponent must reveal hidden action cards for 1 turn.
flavor: No likes, no comments, just bookmarks.

title: GOONING TIME
effect: Skip your next attack phase due to excessive distraction. Recover 5 HP.

title: Shadowbanned
effect: Target card cannot attack or be targeted for 3 turns.
flavor: You're shouting into the void, sweetie.

title: Ratio Failed
effect: Your attack deals 0 damage and you lose 10 HP.

title: Alt Account
effect: Revive one canceled or banned card with half HP.

title: Delete Tweet
effect: Cancel the last action or ability played this turn.

title: Community Notes
effect: Opponent’s next attack deals half damage.

title: Scrolling Doom
effect: Skip your own attack phase. Opponent skips their next turn.

title: Bot Surge
effect: Deal 5 damage to every card in play, including your own.

title: Scheduled Post
effect: Play an action card from your hand at the start of the next turn.

title: Replied to Elon
effect: Flip a coin. Heads: draw 2 cards. Tails: discard your hand.
flavor: Elon liked your post. For real. RIP.

title: Hot Take
effect: Choose: gain +30 attack this turn, or lose 20 HP permanently.

title: Who Asked?
effect: Negate a passive ability this turn.

title: Threads User Detected
effect: Force a player to discard their highest-tier card.
flavor: Don’t worry, they’re not coming back.
